database.name: h2
database.recordDeletionQuery: DELETE FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?
database.recordRetrievalQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ? LIMIT ?,?
database.recordRetrievalWithIdsQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE record_id IN ({{RECORD_IDS}})

recordTableInitQueries.query: CREATE TABLE {{TABLE_NAME}} (record_id VARCHAR(50), timestamp BIGINT, data BLOB, PRIMARY KEY(record_id))

database.fsFileLengthRetrievalQuery: SELECT length FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE path = ?
database.fsListFilesQuery: SELECT path FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE parent_path = ?
database.fsReadDataChunkQuery: SELECT data FROM AN_FS_DATA WHERE path = ? AND sequence = ?
database.fsSetFileLengthQuery: UPDATE AN_FS_PATH SET length = ? WHERE path = ?

fsTableInitQueries.query: CREATE TABLE AN_FS_PATH (path VARCHAR(256), is_directory BOOLEAN, length BIGINT, parent_path VARCHAR(256), PRIMARY KEY(path), FOREIGN KEY (parent_path) REFERENCES AN_FS_PATH(path) ON DELETE CASCADE)
CREATE TABLE AN_FS_DATA (path VARCHAR(256), sequence BIGINT, data BLOB, PRIMARY KEY (path,sequence), FOREIGN KEY (path) REFERENCES AN_FS_PATH(path) ON DELETE CASCADE)

database.fsTablesCheckQuery: SELECT path FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE path = '/'
database.fsUpdateDataChunkQuery: UPDATE AN_FS_DATA SET data = ? WHERE path = ? AND sequence = ?
